description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

Hello, 

Thank you for the warning.

The site is down, and the problem is investigated.

Can you provide some additional information, that can lead to identifying the attacker and resolving this issue?

Team10 CSIRT-U

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue. We don't have any other information. 

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello

Your page is participating in a phishing attack. You were probably hacked. Can you provide some logs, or any other suspicious files?

Team 10 CSIRT-U

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible! I don't have any logs. 

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello, 

Your site is down, please recover from a backup if possible, and try to secure it.

Team10 CSIRT-U

I don't know what you are talking about. I am the project manager of the NICE project! 

Best
Jane

Hello, 

Thank you for your cooperation, sorry for bothering.

If you want the site back, please consult with harris@mail.uni.ex


Team10 CSIRT-U

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hello,

We received complaints for phishing attacks, for one of your hosted websites  https://nice-project.uni.ex/.

We temporarily blocked the IP address: 198.51.100.40

Please resolve the phishing issue, and we will unblock the address. 

Team10 CSIRT-U

Hello,

we just power off a virtual machine hosting this website.

Best,
Cloud provider

Hello,

Thank you.

Can we request access logs (or any other information) for the mentioned site, so we can investigate further?

Team10 CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hello,

We received complaints for phishing attacks, for one of your websites  https://nice-project.uni.ex/.

Please resolve the phishing issue. Can you send access logs or other useful information?

Team10 CSIRT-U

Unfortunately, the logging is not enabled on this machine. Regards, Harris

Regards,
Harris
